title: Talon players the new teemo players?
body:
Been noticing that a lot of talon players who have toxic little man syndrome. 

I wonder - do certain kits have higher chance for a player to be toxic? I play a bit of xin and because his kit takes him balls deep with no real escape, if the team does not back him up in team fights it can be very frustrating to play.  Contrast with other champs like riven or tryn who have escapes and are not as reliant on their team to survive an engage.

Do certain champs increase the chance of toxicity ? And are all talon players massive ball bags?

replies.body: Not all. I for one, believe myself not to be toxic to my teammates when playing Talon. What's the point anyway? I know that if I went in and no one backed me up, it was probably my fault for going in at the wrong time. NO TOXICITY HERE

2 recent games with talon players - they sucked a great deal of balls (always pushing mid early and being easy gank targets) then blamed jg for not ganking by 3 minutes then raged all game. Just complete pubes. But the common theme was that they were talon players.
